entry.title: Capita Pte Ltd - Healthcare Vacancies Staff/Sister Midwife (Labour&Delivery/Based in Singapore) (ID: 476387)

link.title: Capita Pte Ltd - Healthcare Vacancies Staff/Sister Midwife (Labour&Delivery/Based in Singapore) (ID: 476387)

entry.content:
Capita Pte Ltd - Healthcare is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Staff/Sister Midwife (Labour&Delivery/Based in Singapore) (ID: 476387) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Responsibilities

• Provide care management for patients
• Assisting nurse manager
• Enhance employee engagement and maximize performance
• Maintaining nursing practice
• Supervising junior nurses in clinical duties
• Overseeing ward nurses
• Maintaining clean and safe working environment
• Performing duties as instructed by Nurse Manager
• Any ad-hoc duties assigned

Requirements

• Min. 3 – 5 years nursing experience
• Diploma/Degree in Nursing
• Certificate in midwifery
• Strong team player
Interested candidates who wish to apply for the advertised position, please email us an updated copy of your resume or contact our office at +65 6709 3505 for a confidential discussion.
We regret to inform only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Job Code: JIE
Email Address: nursing@capitasingapore.com
EA License No.: 08C2893

Company Overview

Founded in 2007 in Singapore, Capita Staffing & Search is a premium recruitment expert and staffing provider for international companies in Singapore and across Asia.
Encompassing local and international placements, contract and temporary staffing, outplacement as well as payroll services across all industry sectors, Capita’s highly personalised service ensures that its clients find the right talent to meet their human resource needs.

Capita’s service offering is split into corporate and specialised divisions. While the corporate division comprises the business support and outsourcing practices that focus on permanent, contract and temporary positions, the specialised division has a focus on the engineering, banking and finance as well as technology industries. With more companies requiring candidates for specialist functions as well as talent with generalist capabilities in an increasingly competitive business environment, these divisions ensure that clients work with industry-focused consultants with specific expertise to match their talent management needs.
In 2012, Capita Staffing & Search expanded its footprint in Asia, opening an office in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia to better serve regional clients.

Capita Staffing & Search has been recognised as one of the preferred HR Vendors of the Year for six consecutive years since 2010. In addition, we have also been honoured with the Enterprise 50 award in 2012 as well as the Recruitment Agency of the Year Silver Award (Asia Recruitment Awards, 2015).
 
More information about Capita Staffing & Search is available at www.capitagrp.com and www.facebook.com/capitagrp.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Singapore.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Capita Pte Ltd - Healthcare is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Staff/Sister Midwife (Labour&Delivery/Based in Singapore) (ID: 476387) which positioned at Singapore

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Radiographer
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Radiographer position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Klinik Putra Care
Job Scope :
  • Performs general radiography examinations in accordance with the policies and procedures applicable to the radiology room.
  • Checks and starts up the machines in the mornings.
  • Shut down the machines at the end of the evenings.
  • Verification of patients identification against imaging request form before proceeding to any Imaging procedure.
  • Select proper projections according tp departmental policies and procedures guidelines.
  • Make sure that proper size films and proper exposure factor selection are used during procedures.
  • Receive and register patients, takes and records vital sign, as requested by doctor in duty.
  • Assist doctor as chaperon when there is a need to examine a patient. 
  • Answer telephone inquiries from patients and others, refer calls as appropriate, and/or schedules appointments with doctor.
  • Obtain and verify patient billing information and maintains records.
  • Assist in maintaining the cleanliness and serviceability of clinic and equipment.
  • Carry out any other tasks as assigned by immediate superior.
Job Requirement :
  • At least a minimum of Diploma in Radiology / Imaging or equivalent.
  • Independent with good communication skills and able to multitask with conflict deadline and possess integrity, discretion and a good sense of confidentiality.
  • At least 2 years of relevant working experiences especially in Medical/Healthcare industry.
  • Based in Seri Kembangan , Selangor

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Selangor.
Apply Online

entry.title: RN Care Pte. Ltd. Vacancies Staff Nurse/ Senior Staff Nurse (ICU/ A&E/ OT/ ENDO) (5 days, No double shift)

link.title: RN Care Pte. Ltd. Vacancies Staff Nurse/ Senior Staff Nurse (ICU/ A&E/ OT/ ENDO) (5 days, No double shift)

entry.content:
RN Care Pte. Ltd. is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Staff Nurse/ Senior Staff Nurse (ICU/ A&E/ OT/ ENDO) (5 days, No double shift) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Based in an acute hospital practicing as a registered nurse
2 days off per week, Strictly no double shifts
  • Assist patient in their daily assisted living needs
  • Medication serving (PO/ IM/ IV)
  • Follow doctors’ rounds
  • Taking reports of patients
  • Work with healthcare professionals to provide best multidisciplinary care to patients
  • Ensure proper documentation of nursing notes
  • Taking and passing of patient reports
  • other ad-hoc duties as assigned by Nurse Manager
Requirement:
  • At least 1 year of bed side nursing experience
  • Registration with the Nursing Board
  • Able to multitask and communicate well with patients

To submit your application, please apply online or email your CV in Microsoft Word format to apply@rn-care.com quoting the job title or call 6223 0772 for private and confidential discussion. Your interest will be treated with the strictest confidence.
We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified thereafter.
RN Care Pte. Ltd
EA License No: 17C8900

Company Overview

RN Care the leading staffing, recruitment solutions and HR Consultancy firm.
We aim to establish long term partnership and trust with both Employers and Talents in the region.
Our Mission is to:
  • Provide personalised service to both Employers and Talents
  • Understand the needs of both Employers and Talents
  • Treat Employers and Talents with professionalism and importance
  • Ensure good collaboration between Employers and Talents
  • Establish good partnership with both Employers and Talents

entry.title: JOY ELDERCARE HOME Vacancies Caregiver
entry.content:
JOY ELDERCARE HOME is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Caregiver position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Responsibilities:
  • Assisting with personal care, which may include bathroom functions, bathing, grooming, dressing, and eating.
  • Following a prescribed healthcare plan, which may include assisting with exercise and administering medication.
  • Monitoring and reporting changes in health, behavior, and needs.
Requirements:
  • Education: no requirement
  • Year of Experience: minimum 1 year in eldercare/ patient care industry
  • Skills: Preferred if candidate is equipped with basic nursing skills
  • Job-Type : Full time
  • Must be able to speak in Bahasa Malaysia
  • Added advantage if can speak fluently in Mandarin/English

Company Overview

Joy eldercare home is a unique and well established age care home that is focused on improving the eldercare industry in Malaysia.
We are currently looking for a dedicated Caregiver to join our team. You will be the key person in providing ongoing support for the elders and the Care Service Team.
We offer great training, a happy working environment and competitive employee packages in the sector.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Johor.

entry.title: JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD Vacancies Clinical Associate (Medical Doctor) (Ref: HLL)

link.title: JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD Vacancies Clinical Associate (Medical Doctor) (Ref: HLL)

entry.content:
JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Clinical Associate (Medical Doctor) (Ref: HLL) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

No night calls!
Attractive Remuneration + Benefits!
Seeking candidates who are willing to join on a 2-year contract basis doing general clinic and ward duties. 
Requirements:
An ideal candidate must be eligible for Conditional Registration with the Singapore Medical Council (SMC) and meet to the requirements below.
  • Basic Medical Degree from a university / medical school listed in the Second Schedule of the Medical Registration Act recognised by the Singapore Medical Council (SMC) 
  • Must have completed 1 year of Housemanship/Internship training
  • Highly adaptive, possess high interpersonal relationship and communication skills
  • Must be an excellent team member

Compensation & Benefits
Our clients offer a competitive salary package. Generally, this includes housing allowance, one-time relocation assistance, medical benefits and annual bonuses.

Interested applicants, kindly furnish your detailed resume in MS Words format to liza.lateb@jobstudio.com.sg or click on the “Apply Now” button.
** We regret to inform only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Applicants who do not possess necessary experience or qualification will still be considered on individual merits and may be contacted for other opportunities. **
JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD
EA License No: 10C4754
EA Personnel: Liza Lateb
EA Personnel Reg No: R1109147

Company Overview

Why JobStudio?
1. We Genuinely Care About You
At JobStudio, we care about how you grow in your career. We make it our priority to understand you, your needs as well as ambitions. While monetary rewards are important, we know it is more than that. A job is about colleagues, opportunities for growth and inspiration. We try to stand in your shoes and understand what you truly want from a job and in life.
2. Rely on a Strong Network
Over the years, we have acquired experience and expertise in many sectors. As a result, we have built strong relationships with major companies, providing us with the latest job openings. More importantly, we know how you work and how you can fit into each company's culture. If you are a professional, JobStudio is able to find the right job for you.

3. You Deserve the Best
Within a short span of seven years, we have made a name for ourselves in the staffing and executive search industry. We hold about 70% of the healthcare recruitment sector. As a testimony to our stellar growth, our founder was awarded with Entrepreneur of the Year Award in 2014. We are confident that we can find the best job for you because we are the best in recruitment.

Our Mission
Our mission is to forge strong relationships by genuinely caring for our candidates and clients.

Our Vision
Building Careers & Growing Companies

Our E.T.H.I.C.S Values
Empathy: Taking a leaf out of your book, we will stand in your shoes.
Trustworthiness: You can trust us like a friend.
Hard Work: We will work hard for you, going that extra mile always.
Innovation: We will continue to look at ways to improve ourselves so that we can serve you better.
Cooperation: We do not just work for you, we work with you.
Success: Ultimately, we want you to succeed in life!
PDPA disclaimer: By submission of your application or resume  to JobStudio, you will be deemed to have consented to JobStudio collecting, using, retaining and / or disclosing your personal information to prospective employers for their consideration. 

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Singapore.
Apply Online

entry.title: NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia Vacancies DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ)

link.title: NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia Vacancies DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ)

entry.content:
NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ)
Responsibilities
  • To ensure safe, efficient and effective management of the daily operations of NKF Dialysis Centres.
  • To effectively supervise Centre Managers & Staff Nurses in-charge in carrying out their daily duties.
  • To ensure high quality patient care services are provided at NKF centres.
  • To conduct and assist in the investigation of complaints and report to the Secretariat
  • To ensure that the Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), Risk Management and Quality Controls are adopted and followed by all staff at NKF centres.
  • To reduce operating cost at NKF dialysis centres by monitoring the usage of consumables, medication, laboratory tests, RO water analysis and utilities.
  • To maintain a staff to patient ratio of 1: 6 i.e. 1 staff nurse and for every 6 patients.
  • To conduct 3 monthly visits to each centre outside Klang Valley and monthly visits to Klang Valley centres or as and when it is necessary.
  • To help plan and implement Continuous Medical Education (CME) and training such as Seminars and Workshops for medical support staff
  • To provide leadership, skill, supervision, training and updates to medical support staff.
  • To ensure discipline among medical support staff and that all activities run smoothly and efficiently.
Requirements
  • Staff Nurse or Medical Assistant with Renal Nursing Certificate
  • At least 15 years working experience in dialysis with 10 years at Managerial level
  • Strong interpersonal skills and able to interact with all levels of people
  • Good team player
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Good presentation & organizational skills
  • Able to drive & possess own transport
  • Resourceful, creative & able to work independently with minimum supervision
  • Possess strong problem solving/decision making skills
  • Possess technical and medical knowledge on all related hemodialysis procedures and management of dialysis centres

Company Overview

We are an NGO that operates 28 dialysis centres which provide care  to 1500 patients nationwide, with over 400 staff. We are now seeking a committed and service oriented person to fill the position in our company.
ABOUT NKF
From our humble beginnings when we first registered in the year 1969, National Kidney Foundation of Malaysia (NKF) strives to raise the standards of care we provide to patients with kidney failure and those who are suffering from various kidney-related diseases. In 1993, we opened the doors of our first dialysis centre at Jalan Hang Lekiu, Kuala Lumpur. Over the years, NKF has grown tremendously with the support from many parties. NKF has expanded its role from being just a dialysis treatment provider, to becoming a one-stop national resource centre for all kidney-related matters.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Petaling Jaya.
Apply Online
entry.summary: NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ) which positioned at Petaling Jaya

entry.title: Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd Vacancies Director of Nursing

link.title: Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd Vacancies Director of Nursing

entry.content:
Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Director of Nursing position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

​JOB DESCRIPTION :
Administrative Duties and Responsibilities
1. Maintain and uphold the discipline and standards of the nursing team. 
2. Ensure number of nursing staff meet the level of acuity of the hospital census.
3. Ensure duties assigned to all nursing personnel are consistent with their education, experience, licensure and/or certification. 
4. Ensure policies and procedures are in place.
5. Develop positive employee relations, incentives and recognition programmes. Promote teamwork, mutual respect, effective communication and build trust culture
6. Develop realistic management plans that reflect the strategic direction and performance objectives of the nursing services and organization.
7. Function as a mediator and resource person across departmental lines.
8. Recommend and ensure adequate equipment is available and safe for use throughout the nursing units. 
9. Attend or conduct regular meetings to update clinical and management related issues to the nursing and management teams. 
10. Support and promote the hospital services as and when required.
MOH, Nursing Board and Local Authorities’ Guidelines
1. Ensure that the Malaysian Nursing Board, MOH guidelines and Local Authorities guidelines are consistently adhered to.
Clinical Duties and Responsibilities
1. Resolve nursing issues, ensure smooth uninterrupted nursing operations.
2. Report any significant issues related to patient safety and care to Medical Director/PIC/CEO/COO (where applicable).
3. Review infection control surveillance reports to identify trends and to develop effective actions to control and prevent infections in collaboration with Infection Control Team
Nursing Risks Management and Quality Improvement
1. Demonstrate knowledge of, and application of Key Clinical Quality Indicators; proactively monitor and implement systems to achieve and/or surpass company thresholds.
2. Ensure that the clinical incidences are reported, and appropriate actions are taken.
3. Develop annual departmental goals and objectives and monitor the outcomes.
4. Develop, direct and supervise Nursing Leaders in the preparation, documentation and implementation of accreditation initiatives.
Nursing Staff Development 
1. Oversee and guide the staff development programmes to meet the required standards.  
2. Encourage and promote optimal learning environment for all nurses. 
3. Support all nursing staff orientation, on-job training and competency skill development programmes.
4. Direct and participate in teaching and learning to enhance the concepts of leadership among the nursing teams.
5. Develop the clinical skills of nursing staff and ensure that nursing staff are privileged on specialised procedures.
6. Remain up to date with clinical and managerial developments in health care. 
**To undertake any other duties as delegated by the immediate superior.
QUALIFICATION & EXPERIENCE :
  • At least 15 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): Valid Annual Practising Certificate
  • Preferably Senior Manager specialized in Healthcare - Nurse/Medical Support & Assistant or equivalent.
  • Registered Nurse (RN) as recognized by the Nursing Board of Malaysia.
  • Post Basic Certification / Advanced Diploma.
  • Valid Annual Practicing Certificate (APC)
  • Preferably Bachelors/Degree/Master in Nursing (or the equivalent qualification relevant to Nursing).
  • A minimum of 15 years of nursing experience with at least 2-5 years in Nursing Administration / Management.
  • Good interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Good working knowledge of Microsoft office.
  • Knowledge of professional nursing principles and practices.
  • Possess excellent interpersonal skills.
  • Impart exemplary and professional approach in all undertakings.
  • Strong organizational skills.
  • A self-starter, resourceful, possess initiative with the ability to work independently.
  • Must maintain confidentiality.
  • Willing to relocate and travel to hospitals within the Group.
  • Able to work with all levels of staff.

Company Overview

Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd (PMCSB) is a wholly owned subsidiary of Pantai Holdings Berhad (PHB), a company involved in the hospital and healthcare industry. PMCSB provides management support such as administration, training, research and development services to PHB and its subsidiaries

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Batu Pahat.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Director of Nursing which positioned at Batu Pahat

entry.title: Osso Bone Care Chiropractic Vacancies Doctor of Chiropractic (DC)

link.title: Osso Bone Care Chiropractic Vacancies Doctor of Chiropractic (DC)

entry.content:
Osso Bone Care Chiropractic is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Doctor of Chiropractic (DC) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Greetings to all Doctors of Chiropractic (DC),

Osso Bone Care Chiropractic Chiropractic is now expanding into an even bigger team!

We are looking for a energetic, passionate, and dedicated Doctor of Chiropractic (DC) with positive attitudes who would like to build their practices alongside a team of highly succesful and experienced team.

Osso Bone Care has been operating since the year 2007 and currently we run two professional centres, one in Kuchai Lama and the other one in Cheras, Alam Damai well with systems and staff in place to handle everything from A-Z. We perform quality online and offline marketing research, management and as well as comprehensive report findings for you so that you can focus on adjusting patients whilst being an AWESOME DOCTOR!

Are you tech savy? We have spent significant time and money getting latest technologies. We practice paperless concept to support Go Green, we use tablets to record daily patients' data, diagrams and as well acting as a bridge communication between you and practitioners to accomplish a modern medical practice and also to facialitate smooth operation system.

Our centres are designed with a modern approach and offers exclusive environment to provide utmost comfort for our patients.

Right now we are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic (DC) with the following criteria:  

  • Candidates must Earn a Bachelor's Degree in Doctor of Chiropractic (D.C)
  • Experienced D.C w/ minimum 1 years experience (Fresh Grads are welcome to apply as well)
  • You must be professional!
  • Possess basic skills such as the gonstead technique, activator method, chiropractic diversified technique, thompson drop table technique and etc.
  • You must be a Good Adjuster!
  • Possitive, passionate, learning attitude is a must!
  • You must want to succeed!

What we can offer:

  • Opportunity to work with experienced and disciplined team in the industry and a steep learning path
  • Huge career advancement and growth
  • Intensive training program
  • Opportunity to learn various adjustment techniques
  • Opportunity for further hard skills enhancement
  • Attractive based salary with high monthly incentive pay / commision pay. That means that the better you perform and the more people you help, your pay will go up substantially.
  • Five (5) Days work
  • EPF & SOCSO
  • Annual Leave & Medical Leave

A Great Place to Build and Grow your Practice!

So, do you want to be paid well based upon your hard work along with your team?

This is the place to be!

Intrested Candidates please call 03 79713632

Company Overview

Osso Bone Care has been operating since 2007 and we’ve successfully served and treated more than 35,000 patients to date. We are proud to say that we are one of the first few pioneers in this field and we are always ready to deliver the result with passion.
 
We are one of the few in Malaysia offering the very own MANUAL Osso Flexion Distraction Adjustment Technique which involves using a specialized table that simultaneously stretches and flexes the spine of a patient in a gentle cyclic motion to reduce the pressure in the spinal disc and restore the adjustment of the spinal disc. 
 
We also pride ourselves by also offering the unique Osso 3D Spinal Decompression Therapy to our patients which is a non-surgical technology that is safe and pain-free. This therapy can help our patients on thickening and healing of the disc. It can also pump nutrients, blood and oxygen into the disc to release the waste and pressure off the pinched nerve. 

More videos and Information at our website and facebook page

Website : www.osso.com.my
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ossobonecare

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Kuala Lumpur.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Osso Bone Care Chiropractic is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Doctor of Chiropractic (DC) which positioned at Kuala Lumpur
